previous.title: Mark Cuban to WallStreetBets traders: ‘Thanks for changing the game — thanks for taking on Wall Street’ https://t.co/5prrz9QHkF

localize.full_text: 马克-库班（Mark Cuban）对WallStreetBets交易员说："感谢你改变了游戏规则--感谢你对华尔街的挑战 "https://t.co/5prrz9QHkF。
